text: Maine Department of Health and Human Services Recoginzes the professional educational achievement of Matthew Bradford for the successful completion of: Behavioral Health Professional - Module 1 on Effective: 1/20/2025 for 2.00 of training hours Provisional Behavioral Health Professional Certificate Expires: Six months from date of hire for Children's Residential Care Facilities staff Expires: One year from date of hire for all other Provisional BHPs Sarah Squirrell Director Office of Behavioral Health
